Index.meta_title: MarkM8 - AI Essay Grading for University Students
Index.meta_description: Get instant AI-powered essay feedback aligned with university grading standards. Three AI models, one comprehensive grade. Just $2 per essay.

Pricing.section_title: Pay Per Essay, Not Per Month
Pricing.section_description: No subscriptions. Buy credits when you need them. One credit = one essay graded.

Hero.title: Get Your Essay <important>Graded by AI</important> in Under 5 Minutes
Hero.description: Instant feedback aligned with university grading standards. Three AI models, one comprehensive grade.

Features.section_title: Everything You Need for Better Grades
Features.section_description: Instant, accurate feedback that helps you improve before you submit
Features.feature_description: Our AI ensures accurate, reliable grading every time.

FAQ.question: How does the AI grading work?
FAQ.answer: MarkM8 uses three independent AI models to grade your essay in parallel for accurate, reliable feedback.
